LightningComponentBundle.description: This component is used for displaying a simple link that can output help when clicked on

property.name: helpLinkText
property.label: Help Link Text
property.description: This is the test that you want to use for the help link

property.name: helpMessage
property.label: Help Message
property.description: This is the rich/plain text that you want to display in your help message

property.name: fontSize
property.label: Font Size
property.description: Set the font size class that you want to apply in here view slds1 text page for available options

property.name: useModal
property.label: Use Modal
property.description: Set this to true if you want the help text to appear in a modal on screen, by default it will appear beneath
